item.description:
Alpinist / Photographer JIMMY CHIN presents: A Mountain Called Meru

Monday, October 18, 2010 | 7pm

Yale Law School Levinson Auditorium
127 Wall Street, New Haven, CT 06511

Visit the official webpage for more info.

General admin tickets are FREE but you should reserve your ticket ahead of time at the link above.

BIO: Jimmy Chin started as a climber, but along the way he grew into an award winning, highly-published adventure photographer. In 2009 he returned to his climbing roots with an expedition that took him deep into the Indian Himalaya, to 22,000-foot, Mount Meru. The climb was the ultimate test to Jimmy and his partners. Aiming for a summit atop thousands of feet of sheer granite, their eighteen-day ascent was racked by storm and cold. Forced to dig deep into their souls to find the will to continue, they survived on teamwork and trust, and came away with the hardest climb of their careers.

More about Jimmy
item.how_to_find_us: Reserve your tickes ahead of time!
item.name: The North Face Speaker Series: Jimmy Chin
